sn12.72-81:10: "Saṅkhāre nappajānanti, saṅkhārasamudayaṁ nappajānanti, saṅkhāranirodhaṁ nappajānanti, saṅkhāranirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadāṁ nappajānanti … pe … pajānanti … pe … sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihārantī"ti.
sn12.72-81:12: Buddho āhāro dasabalo,Kaḷāro gahapatipañcamo;Dukkhavaggo mahāvaggo,Aṭṭhamo samaṇabrāhmaṇoti.
